issue.subject: Design and implement user interface
issue.description:
## Description
Create a modern, responsive user interface for the web application.

## Requirements
- [ ] Design is consistent with mockups
- [ ] Interface is responsive
- [ ] Accessibility standards are met
- [ ] Cross-browser compatibility

## Technical Notes
Use HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. Optimize images and CSS.

## Estimated Time
8 hours

issue.subject: Implement user authentication system
issue.description:
## Description
Create a secure user authentication and authorization system.

## Requirements
- [ ] User registration works
- [ ] User login works
- [ ] Password reset works
- [ ] Session management works

## Technical Notes
Use bcrypt for password encryption. Implement JWT for sessions.

## Estimated Time
12 hours

issue.subject: Fix 404 error on main page
issue.description:
## Description
Users are getting 404 errors when accessing the main page.

## Requirements
- [ ] Main page loads correctly
- [ ] No 404 errors
- [ ] Proper routing is implemented

## Technical Notes
Check routing in the application. URL mapping is probably missing.

## Estimated Time
2 hours

issue.subject: Create API documentation
issue.description:
## Description
Generate comprehensive API documentation for developers.

## Requirements
- [ ] All endpoints are documented
- [ ] Examples are provided
- [ ] Error codes are explained
- [ ] Is readable for developers

## Technical Notes
Use Swagger/OpenAPI to generate documentation.

## Estimated Time
6 hours

issue.subject: Optimize database queries
issue.description:
## Description
Improve database performance by optimizing slow queries.

## Requirements
- [ ] Query execution time is reduced
- [ ] Database load is decreased
- [ ] Appropriate indexes are added
- [ ] Query plans are optimized

## Technical Notes
Use EXPLAIN PLAN to analyze queries. Add indexes for frequently used columns.

## Estimated Time
10 hours

issue.subject: Implement responsive design
issue.description:
## Description
Ensure the application works well on all device sizes.

## Requirements
- [ ] Mobile devices are supported
- [ ] Tablet layout is correct
- [ ] Desktop layout is correct
- [ ] Functionality is available

## Technical Notes
Use browser developer tools to test different resolutions.

## Estimated Time
4 hours
